snippet: Before putting the house on the market, should I clean by stuffing everything in the closet, or be concerned about showing storage space?
abstract: Market Ready Q&A discusses whether potential home buyers are affected by sight of overstuffed closets.
lead_paragraph: Before putting the house on the market, should I clean by stuffing everything in the closet, or be concerned about showing storage space?

headline.seo: Market Ready: Tips on Uncluttering Closets
